job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: <p>A Data Engineer is selected to work for a rapidly growing California tech startup.&nbsp;</p><p>We are looking for Data Engineering professionals with Phyton, Selenium and web scraping skills (all required) to work remotely on their team.&nbsp;</p><p>The desired profile is someone who likes the fast pace of growth and opportunities that a California startup has.</p><p>Very competitive compensation.</p><p><br></p><p>We are waiting for you!</p>
